channel.title: How to change new combat tab to old
channel.description:
Hi, Im using this new client and they completely messed up the combat tab, I already added alot of new items to the game and I didn't realize this when I was working, anyone have any way to add the old combat tab? I can't rep ++ but ill love u for life :) Or if possible a guide to add the old or new combat tab that really works.
[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/dgjl38.jpg[/img]

item.title: How to change new combat tab to old
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

Bluurr’s client only works on certain servers.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change new combat tab to old

item.title: How to change new combat tab to old
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

[quote=“runemaker, post:3, topic:348932”]Haha It was an old blurrs client that happened to have that half way added in, I can’t send it anymore though I edited to much for a server im making[/quote]Can you just .rar yours and upload and pm me the link, i’ll change everything back to normal and to my server, please i need a client badly.

Read full topic
